description: This bowl was commissioned by Eleanor Roosevelt in celebration of her husband Franklin Delano Roosevelt’s re-election as governor of New York, and it has since become an icon of the Jazz Age and an the Art Deco period. Cowan Pottery liked Viktor Schreckengost's design and put the bowl into production. Using Schreckengost’s template, artisans scratched the design into the bowl's surface. Schreckengost then inspected and signed each bowl.
artist_info:
Designed by Viktor Schreckengost (American
1906–2008)
Cowan Pottery Studio (American, 1913–1931)
Rocky River, Ohio
title: Jazz Bowl
